pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Hibiki (2005, TV show)$(br)Health: 60

Has a 10% chance to spawn from a $(l:hibiki/mobs/bakeneko)Bakeneko$(/l)$(br2)Special moves:$(li)Takes out $(l:hibiki/arsenal/midaredouji_blade)Midaredouji no Hamono$(/l) at under 40 health if you have $(l:hibiki/items/henshin_onsa#henshin_onsa_kurenai)Henshin Onsa Onkaku (Kurenai)$(/l) in your inventory$(br2)Drops$(li)2-4 $(l:hibiki/items/oni_ore)Akane Taka Disk Animals$(/l)$(li)0-2 blaze powder$(li)1 $(l:hibiki/arsenal/midaredouji_blade)Midaredouji no Hamono$(/l) (if you have a $(l:hibiki/items/henshin_onsa#henshin_onsa_kurenai)Henshin Onsa Onkaku (Kurenai)$(/l) in your inventory)
